about.heading: About
about.text: Welcome to the Seminole & Orange County Libertarians website. This website is about helping libertarians in both counties learn more about local events and how to get involved in local activism. Check out the links below!

getinvolved.heading: Get Involved
getinvolved.text: One of the easiest ways to get involved is to join your local Libertarian Party Chapter and join the local meetings to find out about events like tabling, petition gathering, and more.

events.heading: Events
events.text: Check out our meetup group to find out about all types of Libertarian events in the area.

donate.heading: Donate
donate.text: Make donations to the Libertarian Party at the county, state or national level to help support ballot access and candidates.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.text: If you have an event you'd like added to the meetup, send a message to the contact details below.
